genders.name: Animation
genders.description: A genre that includes films created through animation techniques, offering imaginative and visually unique storytelling.

genders.name: Adventure
genders.description: Films that focus on exciting journeys and heroic quests, often featuring exploration and thrilling escapades.

genders.name: Action
genders.description: A genre characterized by high-energy sequences, including physical stunts, chases, explosions, and intense battles.
